Agriculture and tourism are the main industries in Golden Bay, so the economy is fairly seasonal.
Just over the Takaka Hill, which is also known as The Marble Mountain (because that's what its made from). A stunning drive with roughly 250 bends and stunning views over both Tasman and Golden Bays.
If you want to fly in, Golden Bay Air provides regular flights on a small aircraft from Wellington.
